page.title: 05THE SILVERSMITH __continued.
page.content: bracelets, necklaces and watch straps. She has to design these by drawing everything before she starts.One item was a miniature watering can, another a rabbit bookmark, and a bracelet decorated with ebony balls.She specializes in repair work and often people with trophies to mend want them back the next day! New articles have to be sent away to be stamped at the assay office.There, a little of the silver is scratched off to make sure it is{sterling silver __ 975 parts in {1000 of pure silver, the other 25 {parts are an alloy,usually copper.}The stamp which is called a hallmark,shows the initials of the silversmith, a lion to say it is sterling silver, the leopard's head to show it has been to London and a letter to show the year it was made. Other assay offices are in Birmingham,Sheffield and Edinburgh.
